solution_line_template: The total number of bath towels used in one month is {kylie_towels} + {daughters_towels} + {husband_towels} = <<{kylie_towels}+{daughters_towels}+{husband_towels}={total_towels_used}>>{total_towels_used} bath towels

The number of loads of laundry the Smiths need to do is {total_towels_used} / {washing_machine_capacity} = <<{total_towels_used}/{washing_machine_capacity}={num_laundry_loads}>>{num_laundry_loads} loads
